title: thillaana (dheem dheem thattOm)
sahitya:
dhIm dhIm tattOm tatatara dhIm dhIm nAdru drudru tAnA nAdru

drudru drudru tAni

tom drudru drudru dru tAni tAni tAni tAm tOm taka

tadhingiNatOm 

(dhIm)



anupallavi



tAm tarita jham tarita kiTa tAma takundari takiTajhaNu tAkiTa

kiTataka jEkiTa kiTataku tAtA kiTataku

takundari kiTataku tItA tadhIm jhaNam tatA kiTataku jEkiNangu

kiTataka tadhingiNatOm 

(dhIm)



caraNam 



bhUmi velayu sOma kulavara shyAma shESuni manavini vini

kAmitArthamu losagi kAvumika kalyANaguNa dhIra udAra



solkaTTu



tAkiTa kiTatOm tikkiTa kiTatOm kiTatari kiTataka tAkiTataka

jEkitataka

takatari kiTataka jhaNutari kiTataka takku Dikku taka

taDIngu DiDIngu dIkku

takkaNaka takaNaka jhakaNaka tittillAna tAna tittillAna

tAna tittillAna 

(dhIm)
